cn.cnic.dataspace.api.elfinder.support.archiver

Class AbstractArchiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.cnic.dataspace.api.elfinder.support.archiver.AbstractArchiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Archiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GzipArchiver, TarArchiver, ZipArchiver

    public abstract class AbstractArchiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Archiver
    Abstract Archiver defines some archive behaviors and this class has some convenient methods. This class must be extended by concrete archive implementations.
